Title: Fan
Writer: Maneesh Sharma (story), Habib Faisal (screenplay), Habib Faisal (dialogue), Sharat Katariya (dialogue)
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Carolina Main, Shriya Pilgaonkar, Sayani Gupta
Plot: Gaurav develops an obsession with a movie star who looks just like him. He goes to Bombay to meet his idol, but he refuses to grant him five minutes of his time. Gaurav is enraged and plots to destroy his hero.
